dcterms:creator: Ana Rebelo
Ichiro Fujinaga
Filipe Paszkiewicz
Andre RS Marcal
Carlos Guedes
Jaime S Cardoso
dcterms:description: The Melody dataset contains pieces of music scores and their source code in LilyPond collected from the Internet, mostly instrumental solos and choral pieces, split into 1 to 4 bar length, forming 4208 image-code pairs.
dcterms:title: Melody

dcterms:creator: Kam-Fai Chan
Dit-Yan Yeung
dcterms:description: The Formula dataset is collected from Zhixue.com, an online educational system, which contains 61649 printed formulas from high school math exercises, with their corresponding TEX code.
dcterms:title: Formula

dcterms:creator: S Impedovo
L Ottaviano
S Occhinegro
dcterms:description: The Multi-Line dataset contains 4595 multi-line formulas, e.g., piecewise function, each line consisting of some complex formulas, e.g., multiple integral.
dcterms:title: Multi-Line

dcterms:creator: Kai Wang
Boris Babenko
Serge Belongie
dcterms:description: The SVT dataset is used for scene text recognition, containing images of text in natural scenes.
dcterms:title: SVT

dcterms:creator: A. Mishra
K. Alahari
C. V. Jawahar
dcterms:description: The IIIT5K dataset is used for scene text recognition, containing images of text in various scenes.
dcterms:title: IIIT5K
